item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Erik! I am a doctoral student at the Computer Vision Lab at ETH Zürich. My supervisor is Luc Van Gool and my co-supervisor is Martin R. Oswald. Before I began my doctoral studies in September 2019, I studied engineering physics at Lund University, earning a Master’s degree. I spent half of my masters at the University of California San Diego, where I worked at the Statistical Visual Computing Lab.
